about_the_game:
You are a Sentinel, a peacekeeper armed with devastating magic and a searing manableid. In the midst of an alien invasion, you must follow the trail left behind by an ancient civilization to find the mysterious Lythlavir before the Interplanetary Union is cast into a dark new era. Will you fight to prevent it? Or will you embrace it instead?

KEY FEATURES

  • Experience a branching, epic story with meaningful, moral choices.

  • Adventure alongside a cast of unique companions, all with distinct personalities and stories. Build friendships and romances or incite rivalry through your actions.

  • Discover new species and locations in a brand new, original universe combining science fiction with dark fantasy.

  • Specialize in powerful magic or swordplay to defeat your enemies, or mix and match to your liking.

  • Travel from planet to planet in your own starship, the Supernova.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for everyone e.g. fantasy violence using spells and weapons, nudity or sexual content and general mature content.

name: Manascape
short_description: A roleplaying game set in an original, quirky and dark scifi fantasy universe. Make choices and lead your companions through a deep, branching story. Blast your enemies with magic or slice them with your manableid in tactical real time with pause combat as you unravel the mystery of the Lythlavir.
